subject: America's Cup
lead_paragraph: Emirates Team New Zealand will now have a chance to sail for the America’s Cup against Alinghi, the Swiss syndicate that raided the Kiwis’ talent and pried the trophy away in 2003.
snippet: Emirates Team New Zealand will now have a chance to sail for the America’s Cup against Alinghi, the Swiss syndicate that raided the Kiwis’ talent and pried the trophy away in 2003.
